lyrics:
58 contributorssarcasm lyricsintro
and it is from this world of darkness which come the evil destructive forces of mans nature

verse 1
youve got me shaking from the way youre talking
my heart is breaking but theres no use crying

watch me choke it down so i can throw it up

before an audience of death

everything you said is like music to my music to my ears
